item.title:
Before starting Monad chain @keoneHD worked in AI trading.
Hi explains why using LLMs to choose from trading signals is unlikely to yield any long term trading profit.

item.title:
Carry trade and market making are now commoditised by DeFi.
Due to open and transparent nature of DeFi, anyone can participate to these trades which previously needed complex hedge fund arrangements.
This is what it looks like when hedge fund managers are replaced by AI agents.
item.dc:creator: @TradingProtocol
item.description:
Carry trade and market making are now commoditised by DeFi.

Due to open and transparent nature of DeFi, anyone can participate to these trades which previously needed complex hedge fund arrangements.

This is what it looks like when hedge fund managers are replaced by AI agents.

nitter.freedit.eu/Arthur_0x/status/1870332551287767258#m

item.title:
RT by @TradingProtocol: A 40% crash in $MSTR on a 10% bitcoin correction gives you just a tiny taste of the carnage to come at next 4 Yr cycle top.
Ofc, it's going to be from a much higher spot. From it's peak, it will lose 80% of its value.
item.dc:creator: @BobLoukas
item.description:

item.title:
How do Hyperliquidity Provider Vaults work?
Hyperliquid offers automated market-making vaults for their order book-based DEX.
Counterintuitively, more market makers are increasing the Sharpe of these AMM strategies and Hyperliquid claims.
